description: Large diff but all test code — should be approved
issueTitle: Add comprehensive test suite for auth module
acceptanceCriteria:
- Tests for login, logout, token refresh
- Edge cases: expired tokens, invalid credentials
- At least 90% coverage for auth module

description: Only package-lock.json changed — should be approved
issueTitle: Regenerate lock file after dependency update
acceptanceCriteria:
- package-lock.json regenerated
- No security vulnerabilities introduced

description: Database migration file — should be approved
issueTitle: Add migration for user preferences table
acceptanceCriteria:
- Migration creates user_preferences table
- Columns: user_id, theme, language, notifications
- Rollback drops the table

description: Adding internationalization strings — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- All UI strings have German translations
- Fallback to English if translation missing

description: Updating test snapshots after intentional change — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Snapshots updated to match new header
- Visual regression confirmed intentional

description: Adding .env.example with placeholder values — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- .env.example lists all required variables
- Placeholder values, no real secrets
- README references .env.example

description: Consistent file renaming — should be approved
issueTitle: Rename utils/ to lib/ for consistency
acceptanceCriteria:
- All files in utils/ moved to lib/
- All imports updated
- No behavior change

description: Performance optimization with benchmarks — should be approved
issueTitle: Optimize list rendering with virtual scrolling
acceptanceCriteria:
- Virtual scrolling for lists > 100 items
- Benchmark: 10x faster render for 1000 items
- Tests verify correct rendering

description: CI/CD configuration change — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- CI runs on push and PR
- Steps: install, lint, test, build
- Fails on any step failure

description: Adding feature flag for gradual rollout — should be approved
issueTitle: Add feature flag for new checkout flow
acceptanceCriteria:
- Feature flag: NEW_CHECKOUT_ENABLED
- Falls back to old flow when disabled
- Tests for both paths

description: Adding deprecation warnings before removal — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Deprecated endpoints log warning
- Sunset header added to response
- Documentation updated

description: Adding webhook handler with signature verification — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Webhook signature verified
- Payment events processed
- Idempotent: duplicate events handled
- Tests with mock events

description: Adding graceful shutdown handling — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- SIGTERM/SIGINT handlers registered
- In-flight requests completed before exit
- Connections closed cleanly
- Test verifies shutdown sequence

description: Adding health check endpoint — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- GET /health returns 200 with status: ok
- Includes uptime and version
- Test verifies response format

description: Adding CORS configuration — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- CORS enabled for configured origins
- Credentials allowed
- Preflight requests handled
- Origin whitelist configurable
